actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives respecting curriculum to teach about the horrors of nazism.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Department of Education should develop a primary and secondary school curriculum on the history of the Nazi rise to power in Germany, the social and economic forces which were foundations of Nazism, and the resulting Holocaust perpetrated against humanity by the Nazis.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives respecting curriculum to teach about the horrors of nazism.
